ive actually been playing this game since 2017 just on different computers so my steam time isnt accurate its a rather simple but still really fun game with multiple different modes to choose from and ive made a few friends that ive kept for years through it though like any other game things could be improved especially in the moderation aspect i hope transformice continues on for years to come and i plan on continuing to play as it grows
